column4: have you tried a search on ubuntu forums or checked your bios?
I've had this problem before, it's not the bios, and I've been searching high and low for the fix I used before and can't find it... one of the problems is that /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/ is empty
I don't know but did google "/sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/ is empty" and found some things...
